subject: Reasoning
question_en: Match the following pairs of words based on their relationship:
question_hi: संख्याओं को अध्याय के आधार पर समझें।
explanation_en:
Countries and their capitals share a relationship based on their geographical location.
For example, India is a country and its capital is New Delhi.
In a similar way, we can match the other country-capital pairs.
explanation_hi:
देशों और नगरपालिका के बाद, देश और उनके नगरपालिका, नुसार नगरपालिका को उसे मिलें।
पर देखिए किसी देश और उसके नगरपालिका के नुसार समझें
उसे नगरपालिका के विसम्बन्दी से समझें।
explanation_en:
In a similar way to the previous example, match the following countries and their capitals.
Understand that Berlin is the capital of Germany.
Now, match the other countries and their capitals.
explanation_hi: पिछाया कलापर विस्मान के विसम्बन्दी से समझें।
explanation_en:
For this question, we will prepare questions related to countries and their capitals.
Match the correct capital city with its respective country.
For example, New Delhi is the capital of India.
Now, match the other countries and their capitals.
explanation_hi: इस प्रश्न में देश और उनके कामये स्मेलन के विसम्बन्दी से समझें।
explanation:
The following questions will test your ability to identify the relationship between countries and their capitals.
Find the correct pair of country and capital.
For example, India is the capital of New Delhi.
Now, find the other country-capital pairs.
